visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a line chart with the following specifications: The chart should have a title 'Monthly Sales Data'. The x-axis should display months from January to December, and the y-axis should display sales data. The chart should have a custom color palette including '#7cb5ec', '#434348', and '#90ed7d'. The chart should have a white background with a 10px margin around the chart area. The legend should be positioned at the bottom of the chart. The chart should also include a button that, when clicked, adds a new series to the chart with the provided sales data.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a line chart with a title 'Monthly Sales Data'. The x-axis is labeled with months from January to December, and the y-axis is labeled with 'Sales'. The chart uses a custom color palette for the series data. The background of the chart is set to white with a 10px margin around the chart area. The legend is positioned at the bottom of the chart, centered horizontally. The chart is designed to be interactive, with a button that, when clicked, adds a new series to the chart with the specified sales data. The styling for the axes and labels includes specific colors and font sizes to enhance readability.
